Class ControlsMenu

  • java.lang.Object

      • rottapeli.gui.menulayer.ControlsMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener

    public class ControlsMenu
extends Menu
    The menu that is accessed from Main menu > Settings > Change controls
    Author:
    Pavel

    • Method Detail

      • setInputWaiting

        public void setInputWaiting(Input input)
        Sets an input waiting to be configured. Disables all menu buttons while input is not configured.
        Parameters:
        input - Input to be configured. If null, notifies that no input needs to be configured.

      • setEnabledToAllButtons

        public void setEnabledToAllButtons(boolean enabled)
        Enabled or disables all buttons in the menu.
        Parameters:
        enabled - enables if true, disables if false.

      • resetTextToButtons

        public void resetTextToButtons()
        Resets text to buttons that configure input.

      • setButtonText

        public void setButtonText(JButton button)
        Sets a text for the button that configures input.
        Parameters:
        button - Button whos text is resetted.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Performs all necessary actions to make this menu show up. Creates all neccessary components.
        Specified by:
        showMenu in class Menu

      • hideMenu

        public void hideMenu()
        Makes all necessary actions to make this menu not show up anymore. Removes all components created by this menu.
        Overrides:
        hideMenu in class Menu

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent ae)
        Reacts to an actionEvent, a button press for instance.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent that triggered this method.

      • keyReleased

        public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
        Reacts to a key release if it's set to listen for key presses.
        Overrides:
        keyReleased in class Menu
        Parameters:
        e - KeyEvent that triggered this method.

      • anyOtherButtonPressed

        public void anyOtherButtonPressed(ActionEvent ae)
        React to any other button press. Sets the input described in the button waiting to be configured.
        Parameters:
        ae - ActionEvent that specifies which button was pressed.

      • backPressed

        public void backPressed()
        React to the Back button being pressed. Return to the Settings menu.
